PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xAF6025^xFFFF77Hello, it's Lazy Exile and it's the POB for my league starter.
This is meant for transition into an end game Hierophant Wander so it's not really a beginner friendly build. However, I made this POB like a written guide to help if you want to follow along. ^xAF6025^xD02090^7_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7
^x70FF70Act 1 - 3 | ^x70FF70Choose the Loadout ^xE05030Pre-Library (Level 1-30)^7 ^x70FF70in Top Right to see the Skill Trees & Skills^7^7 ^xD02090^7_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7^7
Follow the Skill Gems Sections.
Priority Pathing for Skill Trees: ^xE050301. Retribution^7 ^xE050302. Discipline and Training^7 ^xE050303. Ancestral Bond^7 ^xE050304. Elemental Overload^7 ^xE050305. The rest^7
^x70FF70The Vendor Wand Craft^7 ^x8888FF1. Buy/Pick up any Spiral Wands (Add # Lightning Damage to Spell and Attack) and make it magic by x1 Orb of Transmutation ^7- Clarrisa in Act 3 should sell it^7 ^x8888FF2. Buy a Chain belt and make it magic by x1 Orb of Transmutation^7^7 ^x8888FF3. Sell to Vendor x1 Wand + x1 Chain belt + x1 Whetstone^7 You'll get a Spiral Wand with % Increased Spell Damage.
^xFFFF77At level 30, swap to the Power Siphon Ballista Setup^7 - NOTE: You need to clear the Library quest first, then talk to Siosa to buy the gems
^xD02090////^7 ^7NORMAL LAB: DO ASAP AT LEVEL 35 - YOU WILL BE WEAK BEFORE GETTING^7^7^xADAA47 ^xD02090CONVICTION OF POWER^7^7^7
BANDITS: KILLS ALL _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7
^x70FF70Act 3 - Level 60 | ^x70FF70Choose the Loadout ^xE05030PS Swap (Level 30-60)^7 ^x70FF70in Top Right to see the Skill Trees & Skills^7^7 ^xD02090^7_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7^7
^xD02090^xFFFF77*** Level your Gems at "The Docks" by kiling monsters th^xFFFF77^xFFFF77ere.^7 ^xFFFF77***^7^7^7^xADAA47^xFFFF77^xFFFF77
Follow the Skill Gems Sections for Skill Setup. ^xADAA47Go to Kingsmarch -> Talk to Fautus to respec the point.^7
^x70FF70^xADAA47Priority Pathing for Skill Trees^7^7 ^xE050300. After respec, make sure you grab Ancestral Bond, Disciple of the Forbidden, Mana Mastery recover 10% Mana over 1 second ^xE050301. Mind over Matter 2. Instability (+1 Max Power Charge) ^xE05030^xE050303. Shaman's Dominion + Totem Mastery for 60% crit chance^7 ^xE050304. Wandslinger^7^xE05030 + Prodigal Perfection^7^xE05030 ^xE050305. Prism Weave ^xE050306. Elder Power^7 ^xE050307. Heart of Thunder^7
^xD02090/// ^7CRUEL LAB: ^xD02090PURSUIT OF FAITH^7
^x70FF70Your gears should focus on the following stats:^7 Life & Mana Added Lightning Damage to Attack Fix Strength & Dex Bench craft Resist to cap resistance 2x Amethyst ring to cap chaos resistance _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7
^x70FF70Level 60-85 | ^x70FF70Choose the Loadout ^xE05030Early Mapping (Level 60-85)^7 ^x70FF70in Top Right to see the Skill Trees & Skills^7^7 ^xD02090^7_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________^7^7^7^7
At level 60, you should go and buy ^xAF6025PISCATOR'S VIGIL^7 and ^xAF6025MIND OF THE COUNCIL^7. These 2 items will triple or quadruple your damage.
^xADAA47Swap your Aura setup after Act 10 Kitava to include Purity of Elements^7
^xADAA47Pathing Priority for Skill Trees^7 ^xE050301. Arcane Will^7 ^xE050302. Dynamo & 2x Mana mastery recover mana when using skill + guard skills^7 ^xE050303. Forethought & Dreamer^7 ^xE050304. Primal Manifestation^7 ^xE050305. Purity of Flesh, Iron Will, Constitution^7
^xD02090///^7 MERC LAB: ^xD02090RITUAL OF AWAKENING^7
^2Refers to Items sections to know what to aim for // ^xE05030^xB97123^xD02090Replace any gears you don't have with rare items with priority stats as below:^7^7^7 ^x70FF70Your gears should focus on the following stats:^7 1. Cap Resistance (on League start Chaos cap is less important) 2. Life & Mana 3. Added Lightning Damage to Attack (Gloves) 4. Fix Strength & Dex _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ^x70FF70^xFFFF77My discord if you have any questions:^7^7 https://discord.gg/ccK7ZP3CRB ^xFFFF77Link to Video Guide:^7 https://youtu.be/uSxhmmlzl4A

Skill.label: ^4// Get Purifying Flame Gem after Hillock kills
^4// Get Holy Flame Totem after Breaking some Eggs
^4// Get Combustion and Clarity after Brutus kills
^4// Get Herald of Ash after Chamber of Sins 2
^4// Get Elemental Focus after Weaver kills
^5/// Act 1 - Sapphire Ring to help fight Merveil
^5/// Any Wands with Flat Added Lightning
^2Run this SETUP until Library in Act 3
^4// Swap Gem Setup at Library Act 3
^5// Check NOTES for Wands Vendor Recipes
